publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6150 Sandra White: Falling in Love Again—That the Parliament congratulates the St Enoch Centre in Glasgow’s city centre on being shortlisted for the shopping centre industry’s most prestigious awards, the International Council of Shopping Centres Solal Marketing Awards, in the categories of Refurbishment and Community Relations for its Falling in Love Again and St Enoch Working initiatives respectively out of more than 152 entries from 18 countries; commends the St Enoch Working initiative, run with Glasgow’s local regeneration agencies; considers that this has been hugely successful as, to date, 29 retailers throughout the centre have used St Enoch Working and more than 250 jobs have been filled through the initiative since September 2009; believes that such initiatives are great examples of good practice that demonstrate the great commitment of management and staff to local communities and local people, and wishes them every success at the awards in June 2010.
S3M-6150 Falling in Love Again (lodged on 14 April 2010) Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Gil Paterson*

S3M-6150 Sandra White: Falling in Love Again—That the Parliament congratulates the St Enoch Centre in Glasgow’s city centre on being shortlisted for the shopping centre industry’s most prestigious awards, the International Council of Shopping Centres Solal Marketing Awards, in the categories of Refurbishment and Community Relations for its Falling in Love Again and St Enoch Working initiatives respectively out of more than 152 entries from 18 countries; commends the St Enoch Working initiative, run with Glasgow’s local regeneration agencies; considers that this has been hugely successful as, to date, 29 retailers throughout the centre have used St Enoch Working and more than 250 jobs have been filled through the initiative since September 2009; believes that such initiatives are great examples of good practice that demonstrate the great commitment of management and staff to local communities and local people, and wishes them every success at the awards in June 2010. Supported by: Bob Doris, Bill Kidd, Stuart McMillan, Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Gil Paterson
S3M-6150 Falling in Love Again (lodged on 14 April 2010) Aileen Campbell*
